message: I think we can do better than that. Let's split it closer to the middle.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Let's just split it evenly.  We both get a fair share, and we can end this quickly.
Your loss is my gain, time is on my side!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a better share than that. Let's find a more equitable split.
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm running out of time, but I'm still not willing to accept a deal that's so lopsided. Let's meet somewhere in the middle.
